direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve redemption records but for different types of products (locked vs. flexible).
Both methods handle similar parameters and pagination logic, but for different operations (redemption vs. subscription).
Both methods can be tested with similar setups and assertions due to their similar parameter handling and pagination.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized with the necessary credentials.
Environment setup is required before making requests to retrieve redemption records.
Both methods should verify the format of the redemption records and handle similar exceptions.
